adHeader: Local South Bay College Students for Safe Reliable Help
adDetails: College Labor (collegelabor.org) is an online community that connects households, businesses and individuals with eager, friendly college students for affordable help with Household Labor, Errands and Odd Job jobs / tasks. We offer a safer more reliable alternative to most c-list providers at a price well below professional rates. All our College Labor student helpers have been interviewed and pre screened for your safety. We specialize in but are not limited to the following jobs / tasks: - Odd Jobs and Errands: Holiday Help, Gardening Help, Weeding, Pet Help, Delivery / Pick Up Services, Furniture Assembly (especially Ikea furniture), Basic Painting, Event Help, Errands, Shopping, Construction / Remodel Help, Laborer Services, etc. - Moving: Cross Town Moving, Packing, Moving Truck Loading, Heavy Lifting, In Home or Apartment Moving, Truck Rental, etc. - Hauling: Garbage Disposal, Yard Waste Removal, Junk Removal, Organizing Help, Construction Assistance, Mattress Removal, Junk to Sidewalk, etc. Get Started by filling out a short application describing your job on our website - https://collegelabor.org (please copy and paste, sorry Craigslist no longer allows links) Support the San Francisco College Community! Please email us through this ad if you have any questions about your job how College Labor works. Thank you, College Labor Team Follow / Like us on: - Twitter - Facebook - Linkedin - Google Plus
